mapper.select: SELECT rsv.ROOM_ID, RES_NO, MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(RES_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') RES_DATE, CASE WHEN ROOM_TYPE='1' THEN 'Business Double' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='2' THEN 'Business Twin' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='3' THEN 'Superior Double' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='4' THEN 'Superior Twin' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='5' THEN 'Drama Suite' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='6' THEN 'Deluxe Suite' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='7' THEN 'Premium Suite' WHEN ROOM_TYPE='8' THEN 'Sienna Double' ELSE 'Others' END AS ROOM_TYPE, RES_ADULT, RES_CHILD, TO_CHAR(RES_CHK_SDAY, 'YYYY/MM/DD') RES_CHK_SDAY, TO_CHAR(RES_CHK_EDAY, 'YYYY/MM/DD') RES_CHK_EDAY, TO_CHAR( (TRUNC(RES_CHK_EDAY)-TRUNC(RES_CHK_SDAY)) *RES_PRICE, '999,999,999') RES_PRICE, rsv.RES_ANOTHER FROM RESERVATION rsv, ROOM rm, MEMBER m WHERE m.mem_id=rsv.mem_id and rsv.room_id=rm.room_id and SYSDATE < RES_CHK_SDAY
